title: Fishtown Apartment Available
description:
Welcome to your dream apartment in East Kensington/Fishtown! We have a one-bedroom apartment that is move-in ready in an unbeatable location.
This 2nd floor walk-up unit boasts wall-to-wall carpets, a spacious bedroom, and a large living room perfect for entertaining guests.
Conveniently located steps away from public transportation, commuting to work is a breeze. Plus, enjoy the vibrant East Kensington/Fishtown community with nearby shops, cafes, and restaurants — including the always-popular Suraya, Rowhome Coffee, Frankford Hall and LMNO.
This cozy yet functional apartment is perfect for individuals or couples. The unit offers an eat-in kitchen, bathroom with full-size tub and electric heat throughout.
One-year lease with tenant paying electric — gas and water included. First month, last month and security deposit due at signing.
Don't miss out on this opportunity to live in the heart of East Kensington / Fishtown. Schedule a showing today!

title: Beautiful 3-bedroom, 2-bath townhome!
description:
Amazing home for available for rent! This beautiful 3-bedroom, 2-bath townhome sits on a quiet side street in Center City! The home has been recently renovated with a brand new kitchen and two new bathrooms. Walk into the main living area with gleaming hardwood floors, recessed lighting and a fireplace. The large chefs kitchen features granite countertops, stainless steel appliances and a large center island, along with a sliding glass door that leads to your quaint, fenced-in outdoor space. There is also a private, gated alleyway that serves as excellent storage space for kids toys, strollers, gardening supplies, bikes, or whatever else you may need! The second floor has 2 bedrooms, each with good natural light, and a newly renovated bathroom. Next, make your way up the third floor where you’ll find the master suite, with tons of natural light and a fireplace! The master bath includes a frameless glass walk-in shower and double vanity sink. You’ll also have the convenience of a basement with storage space and a washer/dryer. Additional perks include new hardwood floors, high ceilings throughout, central air, and ample closet space throughout the home. Enjoy living in beautiful Washington Square West! This neighborhood is an urban residential oasis with a tight-knit community, offering a thriving food scene and tons of great shops. You’re conveniently located just minutes from all that Center City has to offer. Walk to the lovely Seger Park in just 5 minutes, and you’re less than a mile from Washington Square Park. Tons of nearby transportation options, grocery stores, convenience stores and awesome restaurants. Local favorites include Giorgio on Pine, Double Knot, Bud & Marilyn’s, Sampan, Vetri Cucina and more. Schedule your showing today!
1315 Rodman St

title: Spaciousness of true loft living! Welcome home!
description:
Welcome to Lofts 640 in the heart of Philadelphia, PA! Your monthly rent includes extended cable TV service, access to our fitness center, indoor/heated pool and hot tub with an attached outdoor roof deck, yoga/fitness studio, cyber lounge, 24/7 front desk attendant and more! As you enter 640 North Broad, you'll step away from the busy street and into an urban space that artfully blends the old with the new. The original character of the building has been enhanced by modern accents and furnishings, creating a unique and sophisticated environment. Our community is vibrant and welcoming, with state-of-the-art amenities designed to nurture both body and spirit. You'll love relaxing in our glass-domed pool house, where the warm salt water pool and Jacuzzi spa offer the perfect respite from the stresses of daily life. Meet and socialize with fellow residents on our rooftop deck lounge, or take advantage of our cyber cafe and yoga studio to stay connected and centered. Our lobby is a work of art, featuring geometric ceiling lights that illuminate the mocha-colored floors. With stunning white and stainless steel accents, the lobby is the perfect introduction to the energy and excitement of Loft 640. Located just six blocks from City Hall on Broad Street, our community is centrally located to shops, restaurants, hospitals, and the thriving community of Fairmount. Reading Terminal Market and the Pennsylvania Convention Center are just minutes away. Living at Loft 640 is the perfect combination of the commuter convenience of center city living and the spaciousness of true loft living. Welcome home!
640 N Broad Street N Broad Street #725

title: Make this Luxury Center City Philadelphia High Rise your home today!
description:
Currently offering to pay your rent until January 1st, 2023 if you apply today. Make this Luxury Center City Philadelphia High Rise your home today! Brand New Modern Finishes and Luxury Amenities. Blocks away from Rittenhouse Square and historic Art Museum area - live in one of the most exciting Philadelphia neighborhoods. Completely re-defined and re-finished Luxury Apartments that offer the most desirable attractions the city has to offer. Select apartments are outfitted with all-new finishes in the kitchens and bathrooms. Kitchens have been redesigned with large, white-finish maple cabinets, ceramic tile backsplashes, GE stainless steel appliances and granite counters. Bathrooms feature maple vanities, subway tile bath surrounds, new fixtures and lighting. Hardwood Floors, Extra large bedrooms with walk in closets, extra space for Den/Office and a washer/dryer inside the unit. Come home to stylish living in the heart of Center City. Amazing brand new amenities creating a truly expanse living experience. All-new rooftop social deck with lounge seating, music, free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TVs and a gas fireplace, surrounded by glass windscreens. Updated fitness center with 1500 extra square feet and new Life Fitness equipment with personal TVs, plus larger windows for fantastic views of Center City. Every home is steps from Center City Comforts. Enjoy the convenience of having street-level shops, restaurants, a convenience store and ATM right in your building. Nearby Trader Joes and several neighborhood grocery stores. And to add to your amazing Center City Philadelphia living experience The Sterling's 24-hour concierge service help you with reservations, transportation arrangements and package acceptance. Walking distance to 30th Street Station, Public transportation, FREE Shuttle to take you around the city, proximity to Universities, Hospitals and Offices. Easy accessibility to Major Highways, Museums, Restaurants and Night-life. description: Open house Sunday (5/21) from 11-11:30. This charming 3 bedroom home is available for rent in the desirable Wynnefield Heights neighborhood. description:
https://jg-realestate.com/listing/2325-ellsworth-st/
Welcome to 2325 Ellsworth St! This is a stunning 3 bedroom / 2.5 bathroom single family home featuring 3 outdoor spaces and beautiful finishes throughout. Enter into the straight-through floor plan with hardwood floors and recessed lighting. This spacious 1st Floor provides tons of room for furniture setups and flows back nicely past a half bath and into the kitchen. Here, you’ll find ample cabinetry and prep space, lovely tile backsplash, and an island with counter seating. There’s a full lineup of stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher, microwave, oven / stove combo, and refrigerator. Sliding glass doors lead to your large patio with concrete fencing for privacy. Head upstairs to view 2 sizable bedrooms on opposite ends of the home. Both bedrooms offer natural light, good closet space, and ceiling fans for added comfort. In the hallway you can find a laundry room and a full bathroom boasting a granite-topped vanity and a bathtub / shower combo. Your primary suite is on the 3rd Floor with the bedroom to the front. This spacious room can accommodate a king sized bed and has 2 closets and a ceiling fan. There’s a full bathroom showcasing a gorgeous dual sink vanity with tons of storage and an oversized glass shower stall. There’s a wet bar with cabinetry above and below, wine storage, mosaic tile backsplash, and a mini-fridge. Continue outside to your deck with spiral stairs that take you up to your incredible roof deck! title: ICON mixes the beauty of the past with the modern amenities of today!
description:
Offering Studio, 1 & 2 bedroom apartments. Center City Philadelphia Apartments near Rittenhouse Square Be a part of history! ICON mixes the beauty of the past with the modern amenities of today. Included on the National Register of Historic Places this incredible rental building soars to new heights, just like its iconic, ziggurat-topped peak. Looking for a downtown Philadelphia apartment near Rittenhouse Square? You've found it! ICON is the most exciting rental property to ever grace Rittenhouse Square. A quintessential example of the Art Deco exuberance that defined the 1920s and 30s, ICON's design is inspired by Art Deco's geometric shapes and today's streamlined lifestyle. With this historic luxury building, you can be within steps of all the fine dining, high-end retail and cultural offerings that Philadelphia has to offer. The most fashionable edifice of its day, ICON is as rich in history as it is in beauty. Opened in 1930, at the beginning of the Great Depression, the building's ground floor tenants included both Cunard's White Star Line and the United States Lines, and the esteemed Pew family maintained a pied-a-terre on the 25th Floor. Today, this history echoes throughout ICON, a building that is a rare architectural experience. The lobby is so stunning it will make you stop in your tracks, with its Art Deco-styled elevators, glazed black brick and grey porcelain flooring and a cast-bronze portal. And the residences feature the kind of classic fixtures, state-of-the-art appliances and iconic details that can only be found in a landmark building. Apartment amenities: Kitchen features include sleek high gloss white cabinets with soft close drawers and doors. Stainless steel appliances, including a glass top electric range and microwave. Glass-tile, kitchen backsplash. Quartz top kitchen island. Engineered hardwood flooring. Baths with sleek, high gloss cabinets and quartz countertops, glazed 12x12 porcelain tile. Air conditioning. Carpeting in bedrooms. Washer and dryer. Amazing views of Philadelphia. Enhanced Penthouse level finish on 23/24 floors. Venetian medicine cabinet. Wheelchair Accessible Apartments Available. 2 inch wood window blinds. Community amenities: Sky Deck with 360 View, Includes Grilling Station and Outdoor Living Area with Fireplace. Wellness Floor Featuring a Yoga Studio, Cardio, Weights, TRX & Boxing. Private Dining Room with Fireplace and Serving Kitchen. Club Level with Kitchen, Billiards, Flat-Screen TVs and Large Screen. Media Room for Private Parties. Business Center with Computers, Printers, Conference Rooms with A/V Capabilities. Media Room. Full Service Concierge. Parking Garage w/ Valet Parking Option. Package Receiving. Pet Grooming Station. On Site Property Management. Elevator. Charging Stations for Electric Cars. Cold Storage for Grocery Delivery. 24 Hour Emergency Maintenance. Pets Welcome: $500 one-time fee. Max 2 pets per home. $35 / month pet rent. On-Site Green Drop Donation Box. ** Pricing and availability subject to change on a daily basis ** Photos are of model units ** Parking may be available for additional fee **
